page.title: 20A Small Factory.Frampton.
page.content:
A.F. Drew has a small factory in Mill Lane. He employs six men and together they make farm buildings and gates and things like that. The business has been based in Frampton Cotterell for thirty years having started off in Court Road near where Rentokill used to be. Mr. Drew used to be a blacksmith and mended farm and garden tools during the war. The company builds exactly what the farmer wants this means that everything that is made is different. His main customers are local farmers.
******************** { {THE PRECEEDING PAGES WERE PREPARED BY {CHILDREN FROM ELM PARK PRIMARY SCHOOL, {WINTERBOURNE AND FRAMPTON COTTERELL C. {OF E. SCHOOL, FRAMPTON COTTERELL. {
